name: Fontemer Pearl
description:
When character to which this is attached takes DMG: Negate 1 DMG. Usage(s) will not be used when negating DMG from Summons.
Usage(s): 2

During this effect's duration: The character to which this is attached deals +1 DMG.
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When character to which this is attached takes DMG:</color> Negate 1 DMG. $[K3] will not be used when negating DMG from Summons.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

<color=#FFFFFFFF>During this effect's duration:</color> The character to which this is attached deals +1 DMG.
